about_the_game:
In this demo you can play the first 6 levels, in which you can test the gameplay and the use of all the weapons.

This is a top down shooting game.  Tough gunfights and crushing hand-to-hand combat. Play as a special forces soldier, infiltrate hideouts and attack without being seen, select the appropriate type of weapon for the mission and, when you are assigned only one, use it with caution. Eliminate all enemies, explode barrels and vehicles. Play against time to finish your missions. Hold your position until reinforcements arrive, while enemies attack. Change weapons if necessary, pistol, rifle, bazooka or machine gun.

Dodge bullets, find all enemies, stay alive while support arrives, shoot carefully so as not to detonate explosives near you. Do not allow enemy observer soldiers to see, eliminate the enemies in less than the requested time.

In this demo you can play the first 6 levels, in which you can test the gameplay and the use of all the weapons.

This is a top down shooting game.  Tough gunfights and crushing hand-to-hand combat. Play as a special forces soldier, infiltrate hideouts and attack without being seen, select the appropriate type of weapon for the mission and, when you are assigned only one, use it with caution. Eliminate all enemies, explode barrels and vehicles. Play against time to finish your missions. Hold your position until reinforcements arrive, while enemies attack. Change weapons if necessary, pistol, rifle, bazooka or machine gun.

Dodge bullets, find all enemies, stay alive while support arrives, shoot carefully so as not to detonate explosives near you. Do not allow enemy observer soldiers to see, eliminate the enemies in less than the requested time.
name: Gafes Special Agent Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Play a special forces soldier, infiltrate hideouts and attack without being seen, select the appropriate type of weapon for the mission, and when you are assigned only one, use it with caution. Eliminate all enemies, explode barrels and vehicles. Play against time to finish your missions.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
